title: Akashic Record
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{item-noicon
 |itemtype = Book
 |name = Akashic Record
}}
{{Flavour|The last and greatest work of the Warper Golubria, detailing the most powerful Translocations spells in existence. It is notoriously difficult to track down and understand, as copies of the book and their contents have a tendency to shift between planes at a moment's notice.}}

== Spells ==
{| cellpadding="5" border="1"
|- align="center"
! Tile || Spell || Type || Level
|-
| [[File:dispersal.png]] || a - [[Dispersal]] || [[Translocations|Translocation]] || 6
|-
| [[File:malign gateway.png]] || b - [[Malign Gateway]] || [[Summonings|Summoning]]/[[Translocations|Translocation]] || 7
|-
| [[File:disjunction.png]] || c - [[Disjunction]] || [[Translocations|Translocation]] || 8
|-
| [[File:controlled blink.png]] || d - [[Controlled Blink]] || [[Translocations|Translocation]] || 8
|}


==History==
Removed in [[0.19]].

Prior to [[0.17]], this book contained [[Singularity]].

This book was added in [[0.16]].

[[Category:Translocations|*]]
